channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16813] Procedure v2 - Move ProcedureEvent to hbase-procedure module
item.description: ProcedureEvent was added in MasterProcedureScheduler, but it is generic enough to move to hbase-procedure module.
item.summary: Procedure v2 - Move ProcedureEvent to hbase-procedure module

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
